ValidationRule.description: Ensures that approval is received before completing a name change case.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && RecordType.DeveloperName = "PersonalInformationChange" && ISPICKVAL(Type, "Name change") && ISPICKVAL(Status, "Complete") && NOT(ISPICKVAL( ChangeApprovalStatus__c, "Approved"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Approval required before this case can be completed.
